trialbuffs: Dealing Quantum DMG releases a Shockwave that deals 500% Physical ATK as AoE Physical DMG to the target opponent. This effect can occour once every cycle.

opponent1.name: Disordered Witch - Tide
opponent1.description: Disordered Witches has a Shield equal to 50% of their Max HP, corresponding to their Disorder. While them or the opponents they grants Shields are shielded, they can deal extra DMG to the characters. Additionally, they can grants nearby opponents Shields if they don't have one.  The witches' action are delayed if their shield is broken.

opponent2.description: Shuttleguard Brawler can consume ther own HP to enhance their DMG.

challenge.star2: Defeat all opponents with more than 12 Cycles remaining.
challenge.star3: Defeat all opponents with more than 18 Cycles remaining.

opponent1.name: Shuttleguard - Administrator
opponent1.description: Can summon up to 4 Shuttleguards periodically. Shuttleguard - Administrator can lock onto a selected character and direct his fellow Shuttleguards to attack the selected character. Additionally, Shuttleguard - Administrator will generates a Shield equals to 50% his Max HP when there are Shuttleguards nearby. Critical hits deals 100% increased DMG to the Shield. Once the shields is destoryed, he will lose 2 actions and nearby Shuttleguards' HP is reduced by 50% their Max HP.

opponent1.description: Shuttleguard General - Destruction can buffs nearby Shuttleguards' DMG.

opponent1.description: Shuttleguard Guardian can provide nearby Shuttleguards with Shields, while increasing their DEF.

opponent1.name: Voidranger - Oprative
opponent1.description: When Voidrangers' HP drops below 50%, increases their ATK and DEF by 50%. When Voidranger - Operative's HP drops to 50%, gains a Defensive Shield equals to 50% of it's Max HP. While Voidranger - Operative is Shielded, increases the ATK of nearby Voidrangers and grants them Defensive Shield equals to 10% of it's Max HP. When the Defensive Shield is destroyed, Voidranger - Operative is stunned for 2 Cycles.
